Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: I guess im still not following...  how would i make an on demand block on a MYLO chan?

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content:
`how would i make an on demand block on a MYLO chan?`
if the chain is, in fact, on-demand
step 1) set generate to true
step 2) create a transaction
step 3) wait for your node to hash a block
step 4) if someone else creates a block, repeat from 2) on

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: on-demand cannot be CPU mined from within the wallet without step 2

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: on-demand = mining begins *on* the *demand*/need of a block being created based *on* the *demand* of a transaction needing to be entered into a block
